yào: (графема) замок, ключ
yuè: (графема) замок, ключ
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The metal moon key can open any door in the universe.  The skeleton key is limited to any door in the city.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " gold " to "龠", it often means lock. Song Ding used Hui Hui's "Zhitianlu" Volume 2: "The key to the door must be a fish, which means not to watch the night watch."

" Key " can mean locked. Liu Zhou of the Northern Qi Dynasty, "New Theory: Anti-Desire": "The cuteness of lust can be closed by ears and eyes, but the heart can be key.

" Key " also means guarding. Song Zhoumi's "Normal Words of Qi Dong·The Ceremony of the Father": "Han Wei Gong left the key on Beijing Day, and Li Ji took Dr. Guo Zi as the boat, which was quite slow."

" Key " also means key. "Xin Tang Shu·Li Baozhen Biography": "Nai Jun used the seal key to supervise the army, and the funeral was started."

" Key " also means key and pivotal. In Ming Dynasty Xu Hongzu's "Xu Xiake's Journey: A Diary of a Journey to the West of Guangdong": "There is a village at the foot of the north of the mountain, and its name is Jincun, which is the key to the station."

" Key " is also the same as " 𨷲 ", which means a straight wood or straight iron rod that penetrates the horizontal bar under the door and penetrates into the ground. "Dialect" Fifth: "The key is from the east of Guan, the key between Chen and Chu, and the key from the west is the key."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " gold " to "龠", it often means lock.
humanum_full_description:
從「金」，「龠」聲，常表示鎖。宋丁用晦《芝田錄》卷二：「門鑰必以魚，取其不瞑目守夜之義。」

　　「鑰」可表示鎖閉。北齊劉晝《新論‧防欲》：「嗜慾之萌，耳目可關，而心意可鑰。」

　　「鑰」也表示鎮守。宋周密《齊東野語‧父執之禮》：「韓魏公留鑰北京日，李稷以國子博士為漕，頗慢公。」

　　「鑰」還表示鑰匙。《新唐書‧李抱真傳》：「乃遽以印鑰上監軍，始發喪。」

　　「鑰」亦表示關鍵、樞要。明徐弘祖《徐霞客游記‧粵西游日記四》：「又半里，有村在山北之麓，其名曰金村，乃是站之當鑰者。」

　　「鑰」也同「𨷲」，表示門下上貫橫閂、下插入地的直木或直鐵棍。《方言》第五：「戶鑰，自關之東，陳楚之間謂之鍵，自關之西，謂之鑰。」

從「 金 」，「 龠 」聲，常表示鎖。宋丁用晦《芝田錄》卷二：「門鑰必以魚，取其不瞑目守夜之義。」 「 鑰 」可表示鎖閉。北齊劉晝《新論‧防欲》：「嗜慾之萌，耳目可關，而心意可鑰。」 「 鑰 」也表示鎮守。宋周密《齊東野語‧父執之禮》：「韓魏公留鑰北京日，李稷以國子博士為漕，頗慢公。」 「 鑰 」還表示鑰匙。《新唐書‧李抱真傳》：「乃遽以印鑰上監軍，始發喪。」 「 鑰 」亦表示關鍵、樞要。明徐弘祖《徐霞客游記‧粵西游日記四》：「又半里，有村在山北之麓，其名曰金村，乃是站之當鑰者。」 「 鑰 」也同「 𨷲 」，表示門下上貫橫閂、下插入地的直木或直鐵棍。《方言》第五：「戶鑰，自關之東，陳楚之間謂之鍵，自關之西，謂之鑰。」
From the sound of " gold" to " 龠", it often means lock. Song Ding used Hui Hui's "Zhitianlu" Volume 2: "The key to the door must be a fish, which means not to watch the night watch." " Key" can mean locked. Liu Zhou of the Northern Qi Dynasty, "New Theory: Anti-Desire": "The cuteness of lust can be closed by ears and eyes, but the heart can be key. " Key" also means guarding. Song Zhoumi's "Normal Words of Qi Dong·The Ceremony of the Father": "Han Wei Gong left the key on Beijing Day, and Li Ji took Dr. Guo Zi as the boat, which was quite slow." " Key" also means key. "Xin Tang Shu·Li Baozhen Biography": "Nai Jun used the seal key to supervise the army, and the funeral was started." " Key" also means key and pivotal. In Ming Dynasty Xu Hongzu's "Xu Xiake's Journey: A Diary of a Journey to the West of Guangdong": "There is a village at the foot of the north of the mountain, and its name is Jincun, which is the key to the station." " Key" is also the same as " 𨷲", which means a straight wood or straight iron rod that penetrates the horizontal bar under the door and penetrates into the ground. "Dialect" Fifth: "The key is from the east of Guan, the key between Chen and Chu, and the key from the west is the key."

鑰字的基本解释

鑰
yuè

鑰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuè］［yào］
［《廣韻》以灼切，入藥，以。］
“钥1”的繁体字。
(1)同“”。门下上贯横闩、下插入地的直木或直铁棍。
(2)锁。
(3)关；锁闭。
(4)留守，镇守。
(5)钥匙。
(6)关键，枢要。

鑰字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鑰； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1326第31
【廣韻】以灼切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】弋灼切，?音藥。【說文】本作?。關下牡也。【揚子·方言】戸鑰，自關而西謂之鑰。【抱朴子·至理卷】堅玉鑰於命門，結北極於黃庭。　又通作籥。【戰國策】齊君之魯，魯人投其籥，不果內。【史記·蕭相國世家】高祖出征，何每居守管籥。　又入也。【淮南子·原道訓】排閶闔，鑰天門。【註】鑰，入也。

Traditional Chinese characters for "Key 1".
(1) Same as "". A straight wood or straight iron rod that penetrates through the horizontal bolt under the door and is inserted into the ground under the door.
(2) Lock.
(3) Closed; locked.
(4) Stay behind and guard.
(5) The key.
(6) The key, the pivotal point.
